data.title: Visual Grounding in Video for Unsupervised Word Translation
data.description: Our goal is to use visual grounding to improve unsupervised word mapping between languages. The key idea is to establish a common visual representation between two languages by learning embeddings from unpaired instructional videos narrated in the native language.
